name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-document-explorer
title: Document Library Explorer
shortDescription: A comprehensive SharePoint Framework web part for browsing, searching, and filtering documents across multiple document libraries with folder tree navigation.
longDescription: A comprehensive SharePoint Framework (SPFx) web part that enables users to browse, search, and filter documents across multiple SharePoint document libraries. Features an interactive folder tree navigation with recursive expansion, sortable file list with detailed metadata, and advanced filtering capabilities. Supports configurable three-panel layout (folder tree, file list, filter panel) with dynamic sizing, permission-aware library loading, direct file access, and both desktop and mobile-friendly layouts.

thumbnails.alt: Three panel view with folder tree, file list, and filters

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
